analyzed: mahā ugra tārā aṣṭaka stotram
mātar nīlasarasvati praṇamatām saubhāgya sampad prade
pratyālīḍha pada sthite śava hṛdi smera ānana ambhoruhe
phulla indīvara locana traya yute kartī kapāla utpale
khaḍgam ca ādadhatī tvam eva śaraṇam tvām īśvarīm āśraye  /
sadyas prākṛta gadya padya racanā sarva artha siddhi prade
nīla indīvara locana traya yute kāruṇya vārāṃnidhe
saubhāgya amṛta varṣaṇena kṛpayā siñca tvam asmādṛśam
kharve sarpa ādi bhūṣā ujjvale
vyāghra tvac parivīta sundara kaṭi vyādhūta ghaṇṭā aṅkite
sadyas kṛtta galat rajaḥ parilasat muṇḍa dvayī mūrdhaja
granthi śreṇi nṛ muṇḍa dāma lalite bhīme bhayam nāśaya
huṃ phaṭkāra mayi tvam eva śaraṇam mantra ātmike mādṛśaḥ
mūrtiḥ te janani tridhāma ghaṭitā sthūlā ati sūkṣmā parā

original: vedanāṃ nahi gocarā kathamapi prāptāṃ nu tāmāśraye || 4 ||
analyzed: vedanām nahi gocarā katham api prāptām nu tām āśraye
tvad pāda ambuja sevayā sukṛtinaḥ gacchanti sāyujya tām
tasya śrī parameśvarī trinayana brahma ādi saumya ātmanaḥ

original: mātastvatpadasevane hi vimukhān ko mandadhīḥ sevate || 5 ||
analyzed: mātar tvad pada sevane hi vimukhān kaḥ manda dhīḥ sevate
mātar tvad pada paṅkaja dvaya rajaḥ mudrā aṅka koṭīriṇa
ste deva asura saṃgare vijayinaḥ niḥśaṅkam aṅke gatāḥ

original: devo'haṃ bhuvane na me sama iti sparddhāṃ vahantaḥ pare
analyzed: devaḥ uham bhuvane na me samaḥ iti sparddhām vahantaḥ pare

original: tattulyā niyataṃ tathā ciramamī nāśaṃ vrajanti svayam || 6 ||
analyzed: tad tulyāḥ niyatam tathā ciram amī nāśam vrajanti svayam

original: tvannāmasmaraṇāt palāyanaparā draṣṭuṃ ca śaktā na te
analyzed: tvad nāma smaraṇāt palāyana parāḥ draṣṭum ca śaktāḥ na te
bhūta preta piśāca rākṣasa gaṇāḥ yakṣāḥ ca nāga adhipāḥ
daityāḥ dānava puṅgavāḥ ca khacarāḥ vyāghra ādikāḥ

original: ḍākinyaḥ kupitāntakāśca manujā mātaḥ kṣaṇaṃ bhūtale || 7 ||
analyzed: ḍākinyaḥ kupita antakāḥ ca manujāḥ mātar kṣaṇam bhū tale
lakṣmīḥ siddha gaṇāḥ ca pāduka mukhāḥ siddhāḥ tathā
stambhaḥ ca api raṇa aṅgaṇe gaja ghaṭā stambhaḥ tathā mohanam

original: mātastvatpadasevayā khalu nṛṇāṃ siddhyanti te te guṇāḥ
analyzed: mātar tvad pada sevayā khalu nṛṇām siddhi anti te te guṇāḥ

original: kāntiḥ kāntatarā bhavecca mahatī mūḍho'pi vācaspatiḥ || 8 ||
analyzed: kāntiḥ kāntatarā bhavet ca mahatī mūḍhaḥ api vācaspatiḥ
tārāṣṭakam idam ramyam bhaktimān yaḥ paṭhet naraḥ
prātar madhyāhna kāle ca sāyāhne niyataḥ śuciḥ
labhate kavi tām divyām sarva śāstra artha vid bhavet
lakṣmīm anaśvarām prāpya bhuktvā bhogān yathā īpsitān

original: kīrti kāntiṃ ca nairujyaṃ sarveṣāṃ priyatāṃ vrajet |
analyzed: kīrti kāntim ca nairujyam sarveṣām priya tām vrajet
vikhyātim ca eva lokeṣu prāpya ante mokṣam āpnuyāt
śrī mahā ugra tārā aṣṭaka stotram samāptam
